title: It's good but you can do better!!!
body: This is a really good mop with microfibre refills you can buy or to the actual cleaning part which isn't too much pain thanks to this product, Although it does take a struggle to clean out corners of your room course as it is so if you can go for a rectangle one which might be a bit expensive but overall it's a good mop and does its work well. I have had this for a long time and it hasn't given me any bending issues or any build issues like that.
